title: Quinta da Regaleira
summary: Quinta da Regaleira is a quinta located near the historic centre of Sintra, Portugal. It is classified as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO within the "Cultural Landscape of Sintra". Along with the other palaces in the area such as the Quinta do Rel√≥gio, Pena, Monserrate and Seteais palaces, it is considered one of the principal tourist attractions of Sintra.
